structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Establishment of fire protection district by water district.
law.text: The board of commissioners of any legally existing water district created under the authority of KRS Chapter 74 may have the power to create a fire protection district where no fire protection district exists by following the procedures of KRS 65.810 and 75.010.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 64, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 1.
